p: The epidemiological model is applied to simulate single transmission clusters originating from one infectious individual imported at coordinates ( x 0, y 0) and time t 0. A transmission cluster is defined as the set of all human infections directly and indirectly generated by the index case until stochastic fadeout of the chain of transmission [ 36] (i.e. when the number of exposed and infectious mosquitoes and humans is zero) and the cluster size is defined as the number of secondary symptomatic infections [ 16].
